channel.title: 15 Minutes of Metal: The Heavy Metal Podcast
channel.description:
We have moved! Please go to http://fifteenminutesofmetal.podbean.com
Trying to find new heavy metal bands to listen to. 15 Minutes of Metal Podcast gives you four new groups each show that you won't find being played on corporate radio stations. We do the searching for you and give you 15 minutes of music each week that focuses on bands flying under the radar of corporate radio. Let me know if you have any music from a band you think should be heard by the world but falls through the cracks of corporate radio. Have a band? Send a MP3 to 15 Minutes of Metal and it will be played.
All songs played on the show are "podcast safe" or are played with the permission of the artist.
